0.1.name: wordpress/breadcrumb-navxt-widget-plugin
0.1.description: The BreadCrumb NavXT Widget Plugin is a solution I developed for the BreadCrumb NavXT Plugin. The original plugin is absolutely wonderful, but requires users to insert the plugin's function call directly into their current theme to display the breadcrumb navigation. This plugin simply creates a widget for the breadcrumb so that users can easily insert it into their site.
